title: JobMint
overview: A unified workspace for your entire job search. Track applications, build resumes & cover letters, search for jobs, and manage your career pipeline — all in one place.
features: Application Tracking — Full pipeline management with status tracking, salary, notes, and saved job descriptions

Resume & Cover Letter Builder — 14+ professional templates with pixel-perfect PDF output, Undo/Redo history, and a built-in Writing Assistant (spell check, grammar & style suggestions), powered by CVStack
Job Search — Aggregated search across Indeed, LinkedIn, and more with save-to-tracker
Universal Theming — 10+ themes with seamless sync across the entire platform
Desktop App — Tauri-powered native builds for Windows (.exe / .msi) and macOS (.app / .dmg)
challenges: Managing a complex architecture with a Next.js orchestrator and a Vite/React submodule (CVStack) while ensuring seamless synchronization across repositories via GitHub Actions and repository_dispatch triggers. Implementing a native desktop experience using Tauri while maintaining a unified theme system across all platforms.
outcome: A comprehensive career hub that centralizes all job search activities, from tracking to resume building, available as both a web application and native desktop software.
